import React from "react" import { useDispatch } from "react-redux" import { login } from "../reducers/loggedUserReducer" import { Form } from "react-bootstrap" const LoginForm = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const handleLogIn = (event) => { event.preventDefault() const credentials = { username: event.target.username.value, password: event.target.password.value } dispatch(login(credentials)) event.target.username.value = "" event.target.password.value = "" } return (

Login

username
password
) } export default LoginForm
